task.title: Add a Static Route
task.shortdesc: If you set the network mode of to Dual, you need to add a static route to override the default route entries, routing the traffic from specific IP address to the specified destination.

step.cmd: Go to Settings System Network Static Routes Static Routes , click Add.
In the pop-up dialog box, configure the route entry according to the following information.

ul.li: Destination: Enter the destination IP address or IP subnet for the PBX to reach using the static route.
Subnet Mask: Enter the subnet mask for the destination address.
Gateway: Enter the gateway address. The PBX will reach the destination address through this gateway.

Metric: Optional.
Routing metric is used to determine whether one route should be chosen over another.

li.p: The PBX will reach the destination address using the static route through the selected network interface.

taskbody.result: The static route is added to the routing table. Go to Settings System Network Static Routes Routing Table to check the routing table.
